pr_title: SAK-42959 Default lang-datepicker to user's local timestamp

timeline.bodyText: Just one method called addUserTimezoneInfo ? And then we add 3-4 new vars around time?
timeline.author: ottenhoff

timeline.bodyText: while we are here, why don't we add the user's current (localized) date/time as ISO-8601 .... and might as well add their preferred timezone (e.g., Europe/Stockholm) .......
timeline.author: ottenhoff
